Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a tile for use within a board.
    Version:
    0.1.24032013
    Author:
    Gareth Gill, John Meikle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tile(TileType type)
      Construct a tile of a particular type.
      Tile(TileType type, RotationAngle rotation)
      Construct a tile of a particular type and rotation.
      Tile(TileType type, RotationAngle rotation, boolean movable)

      • getTileString

        public java.lang.String[] getTileString()
        Get the string representation of the tile in the form of an array.
        Returns:
        The string array formation of the tile split up into top, top-middle, middle, middle-bottom and bottom respectively.
